Room.Name: South Hillborough Plaza
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a large shopping plaza to the south of Hillborough Way.
Room.LongDescription: The southern section of the Hillborough Plaza boasts a number of fine specialty shops for you to look through. To the northwest is the mysterious Might and Magic Mystery Shop. To the west is the House of Hides. To the south is Merdock's Hidden Weapons Shop of Wares. To the east is Platinum Eyes, and to the northeast is Nathan's Light Armory.
